Package paint.ui.view

Class PaintGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

              • paint.ui.view.PaintGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class PaintGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
    Class that is the parent container for all of the rest of the classes in the PaintGUI program

      • PaintGUI

        public void PaintGUI()
        Constructor method for GUI. Initializes the btnTbl, drawArea and menuBar classes to populate the GUI.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Method that listens for user interaction with buttons
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - the actionEvent that is passed and used as the source for checking what button is pressed.

      • load

        public void load​(java.io.BufferedReader br)
          throws ShapeException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Method that is called from the open method to load strings from a bufferedReader and create new vector graphics based off string contents
        Parameters:
        br - is a buffered reader that as a DataInputStream from a FileInputStream
        Throws:
        ShapeException - Shape exceptions to handle poor user input files or null/0 errors.
        java.io.IOException - If command lines are incorrect, this exception is thrown
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Handles incorrect input - empty lines and spaces

      • run

        public void run()
        Method that constantly calls constructor
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
